mapper.update: update rcs_point_data set ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAME_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUOTA_ = #{quota,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME_ = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MONITOR_VAULE_ = #{monitor_value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, STANDARD_VAlUE_ = #{standard_value,jdbcType=INTEGER}, UNIT_ = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_QUALIFIED_ = #{is_qualified,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MULTIPLE_ = #{multiple,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID_ = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
